metadata.name: Private DNS Zones
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS zone.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container"
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. Private DNS zone name.
Optional. Array of A records.
Optional. Array of AAAA records.
Optional. Array of CNAME records.
Optional. Array of MX records.
Optional. Array of PTR records.
Optional. Array of SOA records.
Optional. Array of SRV records.
Optional. Array of TXT records.

Optional. Array of custom objects describing vNet links of the DNS zone. Each object should contain properties 'vnetResourceId' and 'registrationEnabled'. The 'vnetResourceId' is a resource ID of a vNet to link, 'registrationEnabled' (bool) enables automatic DNS registration in the zone for the linked vNet.
Optional. The location of the PrivateDNSZone. Should be global.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Private DNS Zone A record
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS Zone A record.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container"
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Conditional. The name of the parent Private DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the A record.
Optional. The list of A records in the record set.
Optional. The metadata attached to the record set.
Optional. The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
The name of the deployed A record.
The resource ID of the deployed A record.
The resource group of the deployed A record.

metadata.name: Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.
Conditional. The name of the parent Private DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The name of the virtual network link.
Optional. The location of the PrivateDNSZone. Should be global.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Is auto-registration of virtual machine records in the virtual network in the Private DNS zone enabled?.
Required. Link to another virtual network resource ID.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The name of the deployed virtual network link.
The resource ID of the deployed virtual network link.
The resource group of the deployed virtual network link.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The resource group the private DNS zone was deployed into.
The name of the private DNS zone.
The resource ID of the private DNS zone.
The location the resource was deployed into.
